          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Clean Up the World</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säubern Sie herauf die Welt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nettoyez le monde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Limpe acima do mundo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pulisca il mondo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθαρίστε επάνω τον κόσμο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Limpie encima del mundo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Games and Activities related to the environment and International Clean Up the World Day</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiele und Aktivitäten standen auf der Umgebung 
in Verbindung und international säubern Sie herauf den Welttag</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les jeux et les activités ont associé à 
l'environnement et international nettoyez le jour du monde</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os jogos e as atividades relacionaram-se ao 
ambiente e internacional limpe acima do dia do mundo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I giochi e le attività si sono riferiti 
all'ambiente ed internazionale pulisca il giorno del mondo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα παιχνίδια και οι δραστηριότητες σχετικά με το 
περιβάλλον και διεθνή καθαρίζουν επάνω την παγκόσμια ημέρα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los juegos y las actividades se relacionaron con 
el ambiente e internacional limpie encima del día del mundo</string>
          </description>
